Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Runtime > Engine > Engine

References

   
Module Engine
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Engine/Classes/Engine/Texture.h
Include #include "Engine/Texture.h"

Syntax

USTRUCT ()  
struct FTexturePlatformData

Remarks

Platform-specific data used by the texture resource at runtime.

Variables

  Type Name Description
FTextureAsyncCacheDerivedDataTask * AsyncTask Async cache task if one is outstanding.
TRefCountPtr< const struct FSharedImage > CPUCopy This is only valid if the texture availability is CPU only, see GetHasCpuCopy()
TVariant< FString, UE::DerivedData::FCacheKeyProxy > DerivedDataKey The key associated with this derived data.
TVariant< FString, FStructuredDerivedDataKey > FetchFirstDerivedDataKey  
TVariant< FString, FStructuredDerivedDataKey > FetchOrBuildDerivedDataKey The keys for both types of fetches.
TIndirectArray< struct FTexture2DMipMap > Mips Mip data or VT data. one or the other.
FOptTexturePlatformData OptData Additional data required by some platforms.
uint32 PackedData Packed bits [b31: CubeMap], [b30: HasOptData], [b29-0: NumSlices]. See bit masks below.
EPixelFormat PixelFormat Format in which mip data is stored.
uint64 PreEncodeMipsHash When in the editor we have some data that is stored in the derived data that we don't want to save in the runtime cooked data:
FTextureEncodeResultMetadata ResultMetadata  
int32 SizeX Width of the texture.
int32 SizeY Height of the texture.
FVirtualTextureBuiltData * VTData
